content.detailedDescription:
In 1972 i was with group of teens above my 
house at about 10 pm we had built a bonfire
and we were just having a good time talking and joking around as teens do i when spotted a light in a distances. at first to us it appeared as a white light. as it got closer the light got longer in shape. the you could notice pulsing lights started to appear the first color was a redish orange color then more colors could be seen in all about 5 different colors down the side of this white cigar craft. it made no noises and moved across the sky at a slow speed. we watched untill it got out of sight afterwords we all had weird feeling kinda like being scared but more like being a numbing feeling in disbelief. we all had been told all our lives that there no such thing ufos but yet we were witness to a craft we had never seen before.
the very next day in the local news paper the back page news with the picture of the very craft in texas we all seen but less than 40 minutes after we had watched it pass by us. i told my dad and he added there no such things ufos.
content.summary: 500 ft. plus cigar shaped craft with multi color pulsating color lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to the nearby bus stop with my boyfriend. it was a really windy night, and when we went to turn off into the next street we saw something in the south. what struck me first was that it looked like a chinese lantern, but it didn't make sense for it to be not moving when it was so windy out. it stayed stationary and we both stopped to look at it, each trying to come up with theories over what it was. a plane? my boyfriend even suggested it could be a rocket. we were both pretty scared, and we stayed completely still to watch it, still confused as to what the object was. it stayed stationary for a while, before moving to the left and fading out of away, as though it was never there.
content.summary: Chinese lantern like object that stayed stationary before fading away.

content.detailedDescription: While watching the live feed from the international space station on ustream on 02-29-16 i saw a blinking light that caught my attention but i was only able to capture two screenshots before the feed was cut. the object looked like a dead pixel on the screen until i zoomed in and noticed that it wasn't a pixel but a shiny object that appears to cast a shadow on the surface of the ocean.
content.summary: Captured on live iss feed

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from the shops. i saw what appeared to be a plane above my house but i soon realised that it was too bent to be a plane. i then considered that it may be a bird but it did not flap its 'wings' and did not change altitude. it was traveling very fast and disappeared begin some trees before i could get a camera.
content.summary: The ufo flew over my house. i did not have my phone. it was faster than a helicopter at full speed.

content.detailedDescription:
on 29 feb 2016, at approximately 18:20, a co-worker and myself saw something we cannot explain while returning to our work center from lunch. driving north from a restaurant about a mile from our work center, we first noticed the object about halfway through the drive back. it was dusk and the sky was darkening, with thin clouds to the north and east. the object was a bright string of lights located to the north, approximately 25-30 degrees above the horizon, moving slowly in a westerly direction. the light nearest the "front" of the object was of a reddish orange color, and a bit brighter than the rest. trailing behind this red light was a line of numerous yellow, somewhat dimmer lights that were spaced very closely together. for the first 10-15 seconds after spotting the object, it continued to move slowly towards the west and the lights appeared to pulse or waver slightly, possibly due to atmospheric turbulence. after this 10-15 second period, all of the lights started to dim and then disappear from sight. this object remained invisible for approximately 5 seconds, when suddenly it began to re-appear. once it reached full brightness and size, i could discern that the lights were not an exact straight line, but seemed to curve under and out at the front of the object. i infer from this effect that the lights were possibly arranged in a v or chevron pattern, and that i was observing the object nearly edge on. the details of the shape can be viewed in the included rough sketch. the object continued moving west for approximately 10 more seconds before fading from view again, disappearing permanently this time. at no time was i able to see a solid object. the were two other witness that i know of at my work center that saw the object as well.
 my coworker and i have years of military experience between us in the usaf. neither one of us had ever seen an object quite like this. there are many types of aircraft that operate at edwards afb, nothing we know of matches the behavior of these lights. it is our opinion that these lights were not aerial flares. they moved in unison and did not vary in altitude. what we saw was either a large group of objects flying in a extremely tight formation, or that these lights were part of a single, large object. the behavior and consistent altitude of the lights, the distance between them and the lateral motion leads me to believe they were part of the same object.
 also, i believe there are witness to the same event outside my exact location. reference mufon case number 74891, a report made on the same day in california city of a very similar object. california city is located 15 miles north east of edwards afb.
content.summary: Line of lights slowly moving west, pulsed and disappeared, possibly a single large object. multiple witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were asleep in bed when we were awoken by a deafening roar, getting louder by the second. at first we cringed in bed, assuming that an aircraft hit on our property was coming, but as the noise passed overhead, we lept out of bed and rushed to the window. moving rapidly away into the distance (towards the south)was what appeared to be a flying craft the size of a football field. the craft appeared to be not more than 500 feet above the ground. the underside was adorned with many strips of orange lights which pulsated in a ripple effect, front to back.We watched it until it vanished in the distance, bu which time it must have been approaching great yarmouth. 
at first we were terrified for our lives, as the rush of sound was so loud it seemed that a jet plane must be about to strike our house. after the relief of hearing it pass overhead, there followed total amazement when we actually saw the object.The vast scale of the craft was breathtaking. no flying machine known to exist could match it for sheer size.
content.summary: Either one huge craft or many smaller in formation buzzed house in early hours of the morning

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were walking to our car when i noticed several of my neighbors pointing at something in the sky. i looked to where they were pointing and observed a fairly large set of lights that appeared to be pulsing. they were toward the east which would possibly make it over the easthampton/northampton area but i could see it clearly from the southampton area. my husband and i watched it for several minutes and it did not move. there was no sound to indicate it was a helicopter which i initially thought it could be. we left our lot and started driving in the direction of the light and it disappeared. no evidence of flight. it just seemed to be there one moment and then it was gone. it was probably one of the spookiest things i've seen and it made me feel very uneasy.
content.summary: Floating and pulsing light/object. no noise.

content.detailedDescription: It was a night when there was a full moon. i noticed 3 cloud strips underneath the moon. i wasn't sure if they were chemtrails or not so i drove to the local high school parking lot and asked the galactic federation of light for a drive by. i asked if they could clear any chemicals if that were the case. i didn't see anything until i got home and watched the video and saw the white ball bouncing all over the screen right around the moon. it's very faint but it's there. the fact that i asked for a fly by and then something showed up on my video is very interesting. i know they got my communication and were there.
content.summary: White, faint circle moving sporadically to the right of the moon

content.detailedDescription:
On august 15th, 2001 a good friend and i were staring up at the stars around midnight on a rooftop in central mexico, when suddenly a dark silent shape both caught our eyes directly overhead. it was discernible because it had blotted out the stars behind it, revealing a clear cut parallelogram shape along with two glowing red stripes on either end.

the object appeared to coast over us at a slow constant speed, and evoked a strange motion as if locked onto a magnetic path. there was no wind, and there was no sound whatsoever.

this whole incident lasted under a minute, until the object coasted far enough until it was no longer in sight.

luckily, my friend witnessed the same event in its entirety. we were both transfixed by what we were seeing, and overcome with a strange emotion & energy after seeing this.
content.summary: Parallelogram shaped craft with glowing red sides in mexico

content.detailedDescription: Driving on redondo and stearns in long beach, ca, i noticed a bright white orb of light flash in the direction of sw toward the pacific ocean. it happened within a second. i thought it may have been a meteor or large planet like darting in the sky with intense speed. it was startling and it just darted and disappered in the sky.
content.summary: Saw bright flash orb light shoot out from sky sw over long beach

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Lights hovering everywhere in trees around us. lights in our field and hovering on the 171 hwy.. beaming lights on us thru windows and beaming lights on us if we have phones outside with us.. the beams make my leg cramp up (i have an ancient egyptian rune tattoo on that very leg that stands for energy) the beams cause fog and in our house, the lights grow and expand causing electronic like fog in our home that makes it hard to breathe a little bit. when that happens and we try to look at them outside again, it's impossible bc they produce a static harsher than before that like sticks to our eyes and we cannot see.. it makes even the door seem to morph.. it's so very un realistic! it sounds crazy but we are 3 people seeing this very often here in moss bluff. we have one huge light i'm our back field that will zip aorund, fly up, show us all sides of its lights all over it and shoot off.. it's like the only real ship we keep seeing. it's still a ball like shape. there's all colored balls of light moving. blue, red, orange, gold, etc... it's like a rainbow! they have tails, sometimes headlights and some of those headlights randomly jump up over our neighbors fences and go down and zip around in their yards.. i've had personal encounter with am extraterrestrial being.. and ever since then i feel so magnified when these lights come out. there has to be some type of alien dna or object within me. i'm trying so hard to speak to someone about the insane events i've been through. these lights are little compared to such. i know they're out there.. contact me for the big story, please! i want to get this out there!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights everywhere hovering and beaming lights on us. sometimes hurts my leg and the beamed light makes fogs and chokes us. there is static everywhere. it blinds vision sometimes. there's plane - like things zipping around and one huge bright light.

content.detailedDescription:
9 miles outside of saint cloud, two of us witnessed 5 ufo's going over my house folowing one after another just about, and below tree level. the ufo's where in the shape of a triangle. they were all moving south east baking about 80 miles an hour appearing to land in lake gentry. all 5 ufo's had three light that did not blink. 4 of the ufo's had one red light on each side and one white in the front. the 5th ufo had all white lights one on each side of the triangle. they where extremely quite making a small buzzing sound no louder than a diesel pickup engine. the five ufo's where extremely large appearing to be bigger than a 747. the ufos were so low they appeared to fly through the trees as they seemly disappeared into lake gentry. they never did reappear. my son and i went out see where they landed by car and saw other people by the side of the road stopped and looking stunned! they also saw what we saw. i do have an awesome clear photo! 

our feeling where that of being stunned, amazed and overwhelmed. 

if mufon professional researchers would like to see the photo that i took, i will send it to them. this is a great photo.
content.summary: 5 ufo's trailing each other at tree top level, banking in unison moving about 80 miles an hour. ascending into a lake.

content.detailedDescription: Just saw a  line of lights one larger then the others the line of lights disappeared and only one remained and then it did it again several times. i did not have time to get pictures or video because i was driving, my mother was a witness to the lights of unexplained. this occurred north of the city
content.summary: Line of lights one larger than the other

content.detailedDescription: Smoking a cigarette with my aunt and noticed a strange pair of 2 red lights flying slowly in our direction. it made a slow 180 degree turn and revealed one white light far off on each corner and one static red light in the center. it made only a very slight noise as it appeared to be flying away from us and back towards camp mackall. a c-130 came through the area approximately 15 minutes later from pope afb (now pope aaf). i have circled the globe (literally) in my air force career, and i have seen most every fixed wing aircraft and helicopter that exist. from the f-22 raptor to the u-2 and everything in between. it totally blew me away.
content.summary: Flying craft shaped like a b-2 bomber. flew very low and very slow. former usaf ssgt w/ secret security clearance. flew towards camp mackall -us army special forces school.

content.detailedDescription: I had gone outside and saw 2 balls of brilliant white light above the bungalows across the road. they were exactly the same same size, moved very slowly, silently, for about 2-3 minutes, keeping an equal distance apart. suddenly they changed direction, flew off at speed and vanished within seconds
content.summary: As below

content.detailedDescription: Driving 441 between high springs and alachua at about 8:30pm the three of us in a van saw a black triangle shape object accelerating across the sky. with a white light on each of the three corners, and with red lights in with the white on each edge triangle shape and a faint redline outlining the ship. it was visible shape. no sound and quickly moved across the sky and was gone almost immediately.
content.summary: Black object triangle fly across sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard, watching the sky as i had seen multiple ufos this day, and i first saw it in the north, no less then a mile away, 7 or more orbs of light with a glow around each, appeared to be connected by some faint beam of light, wobbled together, but not unnaturally, it was like seeing a dragon fly, it was beautiful. it was around 7:30 pm i believe, i watched it until it flew out of sight, behind my house and when i went around to keep watching it it was gone.
content.summary: About 7 orbs of light, seemingly connected wobbled across the sky in a line, with what i remember as a string like light ataching them

content.detailedDescription: Walking down mcclintock, lookin up as usual, and noticed the object floating along, consistently changing shapes. i watched it till it disappeared, but beforehand 3 planes flew in its direction, but as soon as they got close, they all took sharp left turns and flew away from it. after about 20 minutes of watchin it i saw two black dots fly, one diagonally up and the other down to the right and disappear. it stayed stationary for quite some time and all i could see at this point was a dark aura that had surrounded it. i kept staring at the sky for a couple hours and had seen more ufos, however different in type. one was a string of about 7 or more lights that were in the shape of a boomerang, however as it flew it wobbled and seemed to be, i don't know... the fluidity of a dragon wiggling? the other was two dim lights that flew south for a while side by side then one went north, in a straight line and the other was lost from my vision.
content.summary: Changed shapes, from boomarang, to a straight line to an orb within a matter of seconds consistently

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking to go buy a slice of pizza ,i was six years old.I came up to two people the owner of the shop and a neighbor in the apartment complex.
i told them what are you looking at ,then they looked at me white their eyes white like they where popping out,they didn't say anything just looked at me like i interrupted something.They turned their heads back the the u.F.O ,then it caught my attention i look at it my mind is blown away! i was speechless in shock i didn't know what i was looking at it was so bright like a disk shape i thought i seen windows and someone looking at us i was drawn to look at it like it was calling me attracted to me,i turned back to run i couldn't i remember telling my self ,run! go tell your mom ,and i thought i'll never make it and they'll never believe me,so i stayed i was stuck we looked at it for about 20 min ,i felt like i went inside it time felt like it stopped for us ,we didn't say a word ,i was only sixish ,the lady was n her late 20's and man was n his 40's. then suddenly it slowly hoover's away we seen it cross the st katella into another neighbor hood,as soon as it wasn't visible we all walked away and as soon as i turned the corner my mind went blank.
i don't remember how i came home.
i do remember i told my family .
i started having night mares i was running down a hall way then i come to a sliding door it opens i run in then i'm floating across the room ,the room was all white i couldn't see if there was edges in the room it felt bright
i floated down to a blue barrel of some sort i hide behind it ,i crouched in a fetal position ,i was scared then ,this thing i can't really make detail i thought he had long rubber gloves n a big face like maybe it was wearing a mask .It grabs me then i wake up screaming i would have this might mare every night after that event ,we finally moved and i stopped having the dreams .
i have a scar on my left side of head ,i was a kid and tell people they did this to me ,it looks like a stamp print i would pick at it, my mom took me to doctors they said they didn't know what it was,they gave me a cream i still have it.
i know i was a kid saying these things ,but it felt so real ,i never know if the other witnesses remember anything.
since that day i knew anything is possible,i knew everything i ever thought about the future was real and i was mad that they left me here i had anger like why? i want to know more knowledge ,i been seeking information since then .
some times i think i'm crazy and i only tell this story to people who bring up thing's like that.
i want this story to be heard more so if any one else can help me remember.
i appreciate who ever reads this and takes it for what it is.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I felt hypnotized i couldn't move ,i felt like i was there for eternity ,then it hovered away,then we all walked away like nothing happens and my mind went blank .

content.detailedDescription: I was a child at home with mum, just the two of us at home that day.  we heard a loud vibration and our windows felt like they were going to shatter.  we looked out of the living room window across to the common opposite our house and saw a disc shaped object land. the sound it made was loud and humming. it had lights shining down and we were afraid so hid under the stairs, at mum's request.  after 5 minutes or so, we heard it take off in the same manner.  years later a mobile phone mast was put in the same place it had landed all those years ago.  as a child i had lots of dreams about the ufo's after the event.  there was also a large pylon opposite our house at the time.
content.summary: Landed 50 years ago on common opposite our house.   mum and i definitely saw it.

content.detailedDescription: When i looked up, i saw three caucasion men and one caucasion lady dressed in tight fitting black suits. they looked down at me and returned to whatever they were doing. it seemed like they were learning how to fly the machine. it didn't bother me to see the ship. i did not get all excited. i just told the people in the van to look. by the time they got out of the van, the ship was not there anymore. it didn't seem to be anything special. when the craft went over the house, we didn't run around the building. it was not big deal. on maps, i saw it at 36.168024 & 108.332206
content.summary: Was talking to family members who were sitting in a van; i felt like i needed to turn around and when i did, i saw the  black craft moving real slow, like 10-15 miles and hour, and about 3 telephone poles high. black and no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out over the sea from my balcony. first i saw this object standing still in the sky and i thought it could be a drone, but then it suddely moved very fast up into the sky in a straight line way to north. i run as fast as i could inside and looked out my kitchen-window while i at the same time told my girlfriend to come see this strange object. we have never seen anything like this before. the object suddenly moved fast back to where it came from, and we ran back to the balcony where i recorded this object on my iphone. then we saw this happening: the object moved very fast from high up in the sky above the mountain. bright lights changed from red to green while it moved fast down toward the sea. then it suddenly dissapeared behind the building. we stood there like paralyzed, not knowing what to say or feel.
content.summary: Object changed green / red lights, moved fast above mountains and sea

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my sons dog outside and noticed that the dog just started staring at the sky. i could see nothing. i then took my iphone out and aimed it where the dog was looking. my camera locked onto something with the yellow square in the viewfinder ( infared ). so i just took a few random pictures and went back into the house. the dog was acting nervous and just wanted to go back inside. out of curiosity , i then looked at the pics i just took, and this green orb was in them. you could not see these with your eyes, and i have 20/20 vision. i then stared to take random photos wherever my iphone camera would "lock" onto something. i then started to feel like something was watching me , rather closely. the pictures show what i mean. the one picture shows the orb right against the window, and it is actually projecting light onto the wood window frame. my iphone suddenly went dead. i started getting a nasty headache and i usually never get headaches. i them managed to pictures of it in my bushes on the ground. not what to make of all of this. very strange
content.summary: Our dog was staring at the sky. saw nothing. took picture and it showed up.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking down ivan vazov street, and looked in the direction of the football field, it's a construction site at the moment for some large store. 
i looked at the sky and saw those lights, yellow-orange, pretty big (maybe 5-10 times bigger than the biggest star), slowly appearing and disappearing, as if the object was rotating, or just switching the lights on/off. 

i dont know if it was a single object with lights or multiple objects. overall i observed about 4 cycles of the lights slowly appearing and slowly disappearing. at some point the object started moving slowly. i shot a video with my 5 megapixel phone camera. 
then the light slowly faded and never appeared again. i waited for a couple of minutes and walked away.

i immediately thought it is a ufo, as i've seen something similar in the area a few years ago (tho it was a single light of similar size and color), and my father has seen the same. 

i felt kind of calm and even disconnected while taking the video, but afterwards i felt pretty excited and a little scared. i was amazed and there were shivers running down my spine and trough my body.
content.summary: Hovering, slowly moving yellow-orange lights, blinking consequentially

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the a19 lovely sunny clear day on the 11/01/2016 blue skies etc when i noticed which i thought was a military aircraft very high altitude making big swooping turns it had a chemtrail so i took a picture of it on my iphone i then took a second picture of it and then carried on driving and just watched it until i could no longer see it i then continued to my destination and thought nothing of it. it was then i got home and was scrolling through my pictures and on the second picture i took i noticed on the far right of the picture there was something which looks like a twin  diamond shape or triangle? with a sort of faint chem trail coming from it which i did not see on the day i took the pictures i have added the two original pictures for you to take a look at to see if anybody can figure them out (i`m baffled) i am a very open minded person however this could be something completly rational but it seems very strange that i did not notice it at the time of taking the pictures of the miltary craft? i look forward to hopefully somebody explaining what this was. best regards mr [name removed/cms/tg]....
content.summary: I was driving on the a19 when i noticed which i thought was a military aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
Feb 8th, 2016
2:47pm
oregon coast
florence

invisible flying craft?

while waiting in the local grocery store parking lot in the center of florence, oregon, i took 
notice of this moving streaming vapor tail coming towards me from directly south. the streaming tail was in the form of a mist, vapor. i thought military jet? 
i quickly grabbed my nikon 3100 camera.
zoomed up on the moving stream tail. 
the conditions were clear and blue. 

i began taking pictures. one after the other. 

there was no jet or object of any kind. just a short-wide streaming tail moving towards me.
as this streaming vapor tail moved? it disappeared quickly as it moved across the sky.
there no sound of any kind.

this appeared to me as really strange.
this can't be? 

by the time the streaming vapor tail was directly above me, two minutes had passed. i would say
the streaming vapor tail was about one mile above me.
no sound. no jet. nothing.
just nothing leading this stream vapor tail?

again this was getting really strange!!
i could see clearly the streaming vapor trail. 

no sound of any kind!! no aircraft of any kind in the sky!! any where!!

what could it be?

i attempted one short video with as it streamed to the north.
i feared my nikon 3100 camera would become blurry at the extended zoom.
still no plane? no jet? nothing.
nothing but a streaming vapor trail!

i stopped video taking. zoomed camera back for picture.
then i was able to see an object!
a (jet)) began to flash in and out. 
it was there and then it wasn't?
i could see right through this object?
the craft was pulsating its size in and out.

the object? streaming vapor trail continued to move to the north and was gone of sight.

i downloaded the pictures in my mac computer. 
sure enough. nothing lead the streaming vapor trail. 
nothing.
content.summary: Invisible flying craft with streaming-vapor trail

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving i saw what looked like the beginning of a scyscraper. i watched off and on to see how long of a tail it left, but the tail stayed the same size. after it staying the same way i was driving, after about 15 min. into it i looked over again and as i turned back to the road it was now if front of me but up in the sky and in the blink of an eye it was turned and heading south and then it disappeared. after getting scared at that point i realized i didn't take a picture, but it happened so fast at the end i wouldn't have been able to anyway, because it disappeared so fast. the front of it when i could see it for a second looked like a round crystal. if you have any idea of what it could have been can you let me know. i am still wondering what it was. i filled out the form the best i could. also i would like to tell you about something i saw in the 60's. i swear on my life i am no nut , and having stage 4 metastatic cancer i don't say that lightly. thank you in advance. have a great day! if you do think you can answer me, and you have to call i have chemo every 3 weeks and i have my next one on march 7th, those are days i can't talk.
content.summary: Cone shaped w/ short skyscraping tail and had crystal like round front

content.detailedDescription: A strange humanoid form appeared in one of my photos during a visit to el teide volcano. the humanoid is full white.
content.summary: A strange humanoid appeared

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were coming home from courtenay bc , along highway near a small town , named woss at around 10 pm . everything seemed to be going normal , until i had a sudden feeling of fear and overwhelming feeling of anxiety . both karla and i had similar gut feeling something was off, when we both noticed blinking lights in rear view mirror (passanger side) of our car. we didn't say much to one another at the time , except maybe watching for theses unknown lights to maybe dissappear eventually.  i felt the need to try and evade whatever was fool owing our car , gut feeling i guess, so i sped the car up . the lights stuck with us as if almost attached to our car . all i can remember is praying for another car to come along the highway, because both karla and i were terrified for some reason. eventually i got my wish , a car appeared from the distance as i saw the headlights 1 km away heading south bond towards us on the highway. the lights then disappeared . that's all i remember from thus event . the reason i am sending this information is that other similar events have happened to us in almost this exact location on this highway. there were at least two other similar events that happened to us aswell in the past . both events that i remember we were not followed but sudden light failure on our car and electrical malfunction aswell. i believe that there is something strange about this location , outside of woss on the highway . also when i was about ten years of age , my family and i plus lots of other people observed a fairly large mettalic disc hovering not even 100 feet from the ground in cloverdale bc. until recently i believed this to be just a dream that i may have had when i was a child , and this dream would re-occur throughout my life. i finally asked my mother and my brothers about this thinking maybe they would  just laugh at me and blow it off, but we all saw the exact same thing  just never talked about it. my mom can describe this event best because my brothers and i were kids at the time, but all stories seem to match up.
content.summary: My girlfriend and i were followed along highway , heading towards port mcneill bc at 10 pm , 3 electric blue blinking lights first spotted in rear view mirror , followed my car for at least 8 minutes. similar strange enents have happened to me and karla n

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend t-pooch were out looking at the stars when a giant thing came near us. it was at about 4 in the morning. i saw that the object was moving very fast. i was very scared. t-pooch was abducted by aliens. i think they were probing him. the ufo then moved away and dropped t-pooch in the distance but we could not find him.
content.summary: It carried away my friend names t- pooch and i am very sad now.
